sourceMeaningMnemonic: You want to go to the <radical>sun</radical> so you set up a <radical>slide</radical> <radical>twenty</radical> stories tall so you can <kanji>ascend</kanji> into the heavens.
meaningInfo: Feel the air whoosh past your face as you shoot off the end of the long slide and ascend into the air. It's starting to get hot and the sun is getting closer!
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>ascend</kanji> into the sky and toward the sun because the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>) said so. He's testing out some space travel technology (the twenty story slide) and you're his guinea pig.
readingInfo: As you ascend, look back through tear-filled eyes and see the Shougun staring up at you. He nods slightly. You've pleased him.
